rules_text:
Bucky Barnes can't block.
As long as it's your turn, Bucky Barnes has first strike.
When Bucky Barnes dies, exile him. Return him to the battlefield transformed at the beginning of your next upkeep.
rules_text2:
Menace
As long as it's your turn, Winter Soldier has first strike.
When Winter Soldier enters, he deals 3 damage to target creature or planeswalker you don't control.
